name: XXV century Red Baron: Prologue
description:
Alpha tech demo of our new science fiction game. After a long, bad time, we can release it.

Version Alpha 0.9.451 - PROLOGUE
- Tutorials 
- Training simulators
- New UI
- 12 + 1 missions
- 4 flying modes, 3 planes, 1 submarine, 1 human
- 9 weapons
- 18 enemy unit types
- 14 enemy building types
- controller rumble/vibration

WARNING: YOU NEED AN XBOX CONTROLLER (OR COMPATIBLE) TO PLAY THE GAME.
